hero.title: Nina Moore
hero.subtitle: I help women and couples break free from emotional patterns, creative blocks, and relationship cycles through somatic healing and personalized mentorship

pillar1.title: You're ready for change
pillar1.description: You've done the self-help books, maybe therapy, but something still feels stuck. You sense there's more available to you.

pillar2.title: You want lasting transformation
pillar2.description: Not just understanding your patterns intellectually—you want to feel different in your body and see real changes in your life.

pillar3.title: You're seeking a different approach
pillar3.description: Something that works with your body, not just your mind. That honors your experiences and helps you move through them.

invitation.title: How I Work
invitation.p1: Every person I work with arrives with their own story, their own challenges, their own readiness for change.
invitation.p2: There's no script here—just deep presence and practical guidance tailored to what you need.
invitation.p3: When you step into this space, you're not coming to "fix yourself."
invitation.p4: You're coming to reconnect with parts of yourself you've lost touch with, clear what's no longer serving you, and step into who you're becoming.

transformation.title: Real change happens in the body
transformation.subtitle: I help you bridge insight with embodied transformation.
transformation.description: My work helps you integrate your experiences, activate your potential, and live aligned with what matters to you. We work with breath, sensation, and energy—not just talking about your problems, but actually moving through them.
transformation.closing: It's finding your way back to yourself.

items.name: Cecile Gatto
items.outcome: From Considering Separation to Deepest Connection
items.text1: After 3 years feeling disconnected from my partner, Nina's work helped us rediscover intimacy we thought was lost. Within 8 sessions, we moved from considering separation to experiencing deeper connection than our honeymoon phase.
items.text2: Today, I have a clear vision for my projects, a peaceful and loving relationship with my partner, renewed balance with those around me, and the confidence to make empowered choices. We've now worked together for 4 years.

items.name: Benjamin Barda
items.text1: I came to Nina with creative block that had lasted 2 years. Through the work, I unlocked not just my creativity but energy I didn't know existed. Within 6 weeks, I completed my album, launched my business, and felt alive again.
items.text2: The transformation was real and lasting. Nina opened doors of awareness, revealing new spaces of courage, joy, and creative expression. I'm now living as the artist of my inner world.

items.name: Will Ashurst
items.text1: Working with Nina over the past year has been the most profound investment in myself I've ever made. I've navigated a career transition, healed ancestral wounds, and stepped into leadership I never thought possible.
items.text2: Her ability to hold space while challenging me forward is unmatched. She understands me deeply and interprets what I share with precision, love, and compassion. The healing and value I've gained has been life-changing.

about.title: About Nina
bio: I've spent the past 8+ years guiding individuals and couples through transformation—from creative blocks and relationship struggles to psychedelic integration and major life transitions.
My approach combines somatic therapy techniques, breathwork, energy work, and practical coaching. I'm trained in trauma-informed practices and work with the body, not just the mind.
Before this work, I walked my own path through burnout, relationship patterns, and finding my authentic expression. I understand the journey because I've lived it.
I work with clients worldwide via video call, and offer in-person intensives for those seeking deeper immersion.
I believe everyone carries unique gifts waiting to emerge. My role is to help you access what's already within you.

credentials.title: Background & Training
items: 8+ years guiding individuals and couples
Trained in somatic therapy and breathwork
Trauma-informed practice
Specialized in psychedelic integration
100+ clients served worldwide
Fluent in English, Spanish, and French

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. I'm not a licensed therapist. This is transformational coaching and somatic work. If you're dealing with severe trauma or mental health crises, I'll help you find appropriate clinical support and we can work together alongside that.

items.question: What if I'm skeptical about 'energy work'?
items.answer: That's fine. You don't need to believe anything. We work with what you can feel in your body—breath, sensation, emotion. The rest is just language for describing the experience. Skeptics often become the biggest advocates.

items.question: Do I need to have done psychedelics?
items.answer: Not at all. About 60% of my clients have never touched plant medicine. This work stands completely on its own. Integration support is one specialization, not a requirement.

items.question: How is this different from traditional therapy?
items.answer: We work with the body, not just the mind. Rather than analyzing your problems, we move through them using breath, somatic awareness, and energy work. Many clients say they've made more progress in a few sessions than years of talk therapy.

items.question: What happens if we're not a good fit?
items.answer: That's exactly what the discovery call is for. If I don't think I can help you, I'll tell you honestly and point you toward someone who can. No pressure, no sales pitch.

items.question: What technology do I need?
items.answer: Just a computer or phone with video capability (Zoom), a quiet private space, and a stable internet connection. Sessions work beautifully online—most of my clients are remote.

sacredUnion.title: Couples Work
sacredUnion.subtitle: For partners ready to break through patterns and build genuine intimacy.
description: You're in a relationship that matters—but something's not working. Maybe you're stuck in the same arguments, feeling disconnected, or considering whether to stay or go.
This program provides ongoing support as you navigate the real challenges of partnership: trust, communication, intimacy, and the patterns you each bring from your past.

We work together over time, starting with a 4-week foundation and continuing as your relationship evolves. This isn't couples therapy—it's transformational work for partners ready to do the deep work.

whoFor.title: Who This Is For
items: Committed couples seeking deeper intimacy and authentic connection
Partners ready to heal relationship wounds and recurring patterns
Couples navigating transitions and wanting to grow together

kundalini.title: Creative Unblocking
kundalini.subtitle: For artists, entrepreneurs, and creators who've lost their spark.
description: You used to create freely. Now something's stuck. Maybe it's perfectionism, fear of judgment, burnout, or disconnection from what used to inspire you.
This program helps you reconnect with your creative source—not by forcing output, but by clearing what's blocking the natural flow.
We work with energy, breath, and embodiment to unlock what's ready to emerge. Many clients complete projects they'd abandoned for years within weeks of starting.
This is progressive work over time—building your creative capacity and integrating it into every aspect of your life.

whoFor.title: Who This Is For
items: Creative professionals feeling blocked or disconnected
Entrepreneurs who've lost their vision or drive
Artists ready for a breakthrough in their expression

retreats.title: Private Retreats
retreats.subtitle: Multi-day immersions for intensive transformation.
description: Sometimes you need to step away from daily life to do deep work. These private retreats offer focused time for profound healing, activation, and integration.
Whether you come alone for 1:1 work, with your partner, or with a small group of friends—retreats create conditions for breakthroughs that aren't possible in shorter sessions.
You stay for the duration, allowing the work to unfold without interruption. Includes personalized healing sessions, somatic practices, nature immersion, and integration support.
Retreats are held in beautiful locations and tailored completely to your needs.

whoFor.title: Who This Is For
items: Individuals or couples needing a deep reset
Those ready for intensive transformational work
People at major life transitions seeking clarity

singleSession.title: Single Session
singleSession.whoFor: You're going through a transition, processing a breakthrough (or breakdown), or need support integrating a recent experience.
singleSession.description: A deep-dive session for specific challenges, transitions, or integration needs.

whatWeDo.title: What We'll Do
items: Start with where you are right now—no judgment, full presence
Use breathwork and somatic practices to access what's stuck
Identify the pattern or block that's keeping you looping
Create a practice to continue the work on your own

singleSession.outcome: You'll leave with clarity on your next step, a sense of relief in your body, and practical tools to support yourself.
bestFor: Integration after psychedelics or plant medicine
Trying out our work before committing to ongoing sessions

couplesSession.whoFor: You're in a partnership that matters, but something's stuck. You want to break through patterns and reconnect.
couplesSession.description: A transformational session for couples seeking deeper intimacy, healing relationship wounds, or navigating a transition together.

items: Create a safe space for both partners to be fully seen

couplesSession.outcome: You'll leave with new understanding of your dynamic, practical tools for connection, and a felt sense of possibility.

integrationPackage.outcome: You'll feel grounded, clear, and able to bring the insights from your experience into daily life.

steps.title: Before We Meet
steps.description: After booking, you'll receive a brief intake form so I understand what you're seeking. This ensures we make the most of our time together.

steps.title: During Our Session
steps.description: Sessions happen via video call. We work with conversation, somatic practices, breathwork, and energy—tailored to what you need in the moment.

steps.title: After We Work Together
steps.description: You'll receive specific practices and integration support. If you want to continue working together, we'll explore what that looks like.

finalCta.title: Not sure where to start?
finalCta.subtitle: Book a free discovery call. We'll figure it out together.
